import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Save survey response for a ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/surveys/responses/ticket/{TicketId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Submits or updates a survey response for a specific ticket.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketId** - The ticket must have a pending survey assignment.
2. **SurveyId** - Get from pending surveys: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{UserId\}/pending](/docs/api/surveys/get-pending-surveys)

**Workflow Example**
1. Get pending surveys: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/my/pending](/docs/api/surveys/get-pending-surveys) -&gt; find `TicketId` and `SurveyId`
2. Get survey questions: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}](/docs/api/surveys/get-survey) -&gt; review `Questions[]`
3. Submit response: POST /api/v1.0/surveys/responses/ticket/\{TicketId\}

**Required Fields**: `SurveyId`, `OverallSatisfaction` (1-5)

**Notes**: `OverallSatisfaction` must be between 1-5. Include `Responses` array with answers to each question.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"TicketId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"A user's response to a survey, including overall satisfaction and individual question responses.","properties":{"SurveyResponseId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this survey response."},"SurveyId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"The survey this response is for."},"UserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User who submitted this response."},"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Ticket this survey was assigned for (if ticket-based)."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the response was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the response was last modified."},"OverallSatisfaction":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":5,"description":"Overall satisfaction rating on a 1-5 scale."},"Responses":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"A question within a survey, including its type and response when used in survey responses.","properties":{"SurveyQuestionId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the question."},"SurveyQuestionTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Type of question (e.g., text, rating, multiple choice)."},"Question":{"type":"string","description":"The question text displayed to the user."},"Response":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The user's response to this question (populated in survey responses)."},"IsRequired":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this question must be answered to submit the survey."}},"title":"SurveyQuestion"},"description":"Individual question responses with the Response field populated."}},"title":"SurveyResponse"},"example":{"SurveyId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","OverallSatisfaction":5,"Responses":[{"SurveyQuestionId":"d1111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555","Response":"Excellent service, resolved quickly!"},{"SurveyQuestionId":"d2222222-3333-4444-5555-666666666666","Response":"The technician was very helpful and explained everything clearly."}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
